Our Location
Getting Here

CozyStay Aparthotel Times Square
415 6th Avenue, New York, New York, USA, 10018
Tel: +1 212-555-6699
Email: information@cozystay.com

Spend Your Time With Us

$30

$59

$33

item.title: Menu - Sides
item.dc:creator: kaylolo
item.content:encoded:
Roasted Brussel Sprouts
$13

Pork lardon, garlic, blasamic glaze.

Thousand Layer Duck
$12

Thyme, rosemary, charcoal salt.

Fagioli All'olio
$12

Whipped goats curd, crispy fennel seed puff pastry.

Broccolini & XO Butter
$15

Pan-fried broccolini, XO butter & crispy shallots.

Spring Garden Salad
$14

Watercress, lettuce, radish, peas.

Heirloom Tomato Salad
$16

Beans with extra virgin olive oil.

Wagyu Potato
$17

Russet hasselback potato, creme fraiche, fish roe, chives.

Cauliflower Cheese
$16

Cauliflower florets, Rarebit cheese sauce, Parmesan crust.

item.title: Park View Penthouse
item.dc:creator: kaylolo
item.content:encoded:
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit. Aenean commodo ligula eget dolor. Aenean massa. Cum sociis natoque penatibus et magnis dis parturient montes, nascetur ridiculus mus.

Donec quam felis, ultricies nec, pellentesque eu, pretium quis, sem. Nulla consequat massa quis enim. Donec pede justo, fringilla vel, aliquet nec, vulputate eget, arcu. In enim justo, rhoncus ut, imperdiet a, venenatis vitae, justo. Nullam dictum felis eu pede mollis pretium. Integer tincidunt.

Family-friendly Amenities

Kids Swimming Pool
Extra Beds/Baby Crib
Washing Machine

Room Amenities

Air conditioner
Cable TV
Wifi & Internet
Towels
Slippers
Hair Dryer
Shampoo
Espresso Machine
Safe Box
Welcome Drinks
Pet Friendly
In-room Refrigerator

Whats included in this suite?

  • Private balcony
  • 140x200 cm Elite bed
  • Upholstered seat beside the panoramic window
  • TV-UHD screen for watching mountaineering films
  • Writing desk with USB ports for documenting your adventures
  • Room safe for your top mountain photos
  • Service station with Lavazza coffee machine, kettle and tea
  • Bathroom with rain shower
  • Comfortable terry towels and bathrobes
item.excerpt:encoded: Welcome to your urban oasis inspired by the natural beauty and calming energy of Central Park. Relax on your private terrace or snuggle up in your king size bed and take in the views of Central Park.

item.title: Room Type - Studio
item.dc:creator: kaylolo
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to CozyStay Aparthotel

Modern Studios

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit. Aenean commodo ligula eget dolor. Aenean massa. Cum sociis natoque penatibus et magnis dis parturient montes, nascetur ridiculus mus.

Call Us for More Information

+41 22 345 66 77

$299 / Night

Studio with Balcony

456 ft / 42 m / Park View / 2 Guests

Welcome to your urban oasis inspired by the natural beauty and calming energy of Central Park. Relax on your private terrace or snuggle up in your king size bed and take in the views of Central Park.

Discover More
$299 / Night

Studio King

560 ft / 52 m / Park View / 2 Guests

Welcome to your urban oasis inspired by the natural beauty and calming energy of Central Park. Relax on your private terrace or snuggle up in your king size bed and take in the views of Central Park.

Discover More
$299 / Night

City View Studio

480 ft / 44 m / Park View / 2 Guests

Welcome to your urban oasis inspired by the natural beauty and calming energy of Central Park. Relax on your private terrace or snuggle up in your king size bed and take in the views of Central Park.

Discover More

item.title: One-Bed Apartment
item.dc:creator: kaylolo
item.content:encoded:
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit. Aenean commodo ligula eget dolor. Aenean massa. Cum sociis natoque penatibus et magnis dis parturient montes, nascetur ridiculus mus.

Donec quam felis, ultricies nec, pellentesque eu, pretium quis, sem. Nulla consequat massa quis enim. Donec pede justo, fringilla vel, aliquet nec, vulputate eget, arcu. In enim justo, rhoncus ut, imperdiet a, venenatis vitae, justo. Nullam dictum felis eu pede mollis pretium. Integer tincidunt.

Family-friendly Amenities

Kids Swimming Pool
Extra Beds/Baby Crib
Washing Machine

Room Amenities

Air conditioner
Cable TV
Wifi & Internet
Towels
Slippers
Hair Dryer
Shampoo
Espresso Machine
Safe Box
Welcome Drinks
Pet Friendly
In-room Refrigerator

Whats included in this suite?

  • Private balcony
  • 140x200 cm Elite bed
  • Upholstered seat beside the panoramic window
  • TV-UHD screen for watching mountaineering films
  • Writing desk with USB ports for documenting your adventures
  • Room safe for your top mountain photos
  • Service station with Lavazza coffee machine, kettle and tea
  • Bathroom with rain shower
  • Comfortable terry towels and bathrobes

item.title: Apartment King
item.dc:creator: kaylolo
item.content:encoded:
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit. Aenean commodo ligula eget dolor. Aenean massa. Cum sociis natoque penatibus et magnis dis parturient montes, nascetur ridiculus mus.

Donec quam felis, ultricies nec, pellentesque eu, pretium quis, sem. Nulla consequat massa quis enim. Donec pede justo, fringilla vel, aliquet nec, vulputate eget, arcu. In enim justo, rhoncus ut, imperdiet a, venenatis vitae, justo. Nullam dictum felis eu pede mollis pretium. Integer tincidunt.

Family-friendly Amenities

Kids Swimming Pool
Extra Beds/Baby Crib
Washing Machine

Room Amenities

Air conditioner
Cable TV
Wifi & Internet
Towels
Slippers
Hair Dryer
Shampoo
Espresso Machine
Safe Box
Welcome Drinks
Pet Friendly
In-room Refrigerator

Whats included in this suite?

  • Private balcony
  • 140x200 cm Elite bed
  • Upholstered seat beside the panoramic window
  • TV-UHD screen for watching mountaineering films
  • Writing desk with USB ports for documenting your adventures
  • Room safe for your top mountain photos
  • Service station with Lavazza coffee machine, kettle and tea
  • Bathroom with rain shower
  • Comfortable terry towels and bathrobes
item.excerpt:encoded: Welcome to your urban oasis inspired by the natural beauty and calming energy of Central Park. Relax on your private terrace or snuggle up in your king size bed and take in the views of Central Park.

item.title: City View Studio
item.dc:creator: kaylolo
item.content:encoded:
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit. Aenean commodo ligula eget dolor. Aenean massa. Cum sociis natoque penatibus et magnis dis parturient montes, nascetur ridiculus mus.

Donec quam felis, ultricies nec, pellentesque eu, pretium quis, sem. Nulla consequat massa quis enim. Donec pede justo, fringilla vel, aliquet nec, vulputate eget, arcu. In enim justo, rhoncus ut, imperdiet a, venenatis vitae, justo. Nullam dictum felis eu pede mollis pretium. Integer tincidunt.

Family-friendly Amenities

Kids Swimming Pool
Extra Beds/Baby Crib
Washing Machine

Room Amenities

Air conditioner
Cable TV
Wifi & Internet
Towels
Slippers
Hair Dryer
Shampoo
Espresso Machine
Safe Box
Welcome Drinks
Pet Friendly
In-room Refrigerator

Whats included in this suite?

  • Private balcony
  • 140x200 cm Elite bed
  • Upholstered seat beside the panoramic window
  • TV-UHD screen for watching mountaineering films
  • Writing desk with USB ports for documenting your adventures
  • Room safe for your top mountain photos
  • Service station with Lavazza coffee machine, kettle and tea
  • Bathroom with rain shower
  • Comfortable terry towels and bathrobes
item.excerpt:encoded: Welcome to your urban oasis inspired by the natural beauty and calming energy of Central Park. Relax on your private terrace or snuggle up in your king size bed and take in the views of Central Park.

item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: kaylolo
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to CozyStay, a luxury apartment hotel in Times Square

Your Next Boutique Apartments

Stay in the heart of New York

Luxury furnished serviced apartments in Times Square

Located in Times Square, CozyStay apartment hotel provide a peaceful, private retreat in the heart of one of the worlds most iconic cities. Experience a sophisticated blend of professional services and home comforts. We proudly offers a full range of complimentary amenities and services that provide you with everything you need for an inspiring stay.

Start Exploring Extraordinary Accommodations

Choose Your Apartment Type

Luxury Penthouses
Art Apartments
Modern Studios
Bon Apptit During Vacations and Trips

Experience exquisite cuisine from all over the world

The experienced chefs creates international specialties with unique flavors. Relax with gourmet cuisine and signature cocktails or homemade tonics, all enhanced by beautiful music and gorgeous views over the city. From seasonal menus to dining experiences to satisfy any craving, see what our chefs are preparing for you.

Start Exploring Introducing Our Services & Facilities

All you need to know to ensure your trip is perfect.

State-of-the-art amenities include a dramatic double-story loft lounge, spectacular rooftop lounge, Technogym fitness center, media corner, and a gracious 24/7 resident services team.

Works & Meetings
Stylish Meeting Spaces

The hotel offers three intimate meeting rooms, each accommodating up to ten guests for formal meetings. Equipped with wireless Internet access, speakerphone and tables with chairs.

Discover More Wellness
Spa, Massage, Sauna

In the hotel spa center we offer an exceptional well-being experience combining our expertise, high technology and breathtaking results.

Discover More Training Spaces
Workout & Yoga Rooms

Our fitness centre includes a fully equipped gym, yoga room and dance studio. Maintain your fitness routine during the trip over the stunning views of the city.

Discover More High standards of hospitality

We strive to provide our guests with luxury, comfort & tailor-made service.

★★★★★ 5/5 The hotel is well located. Rooms are very clean. Great services. Very kind people from front desk and delicious breakfast. And I really love the spa! Sophie Laurier TripAdvisor Brilliant staff and exceptional customer service. The place is fantastic. Great facilities and atmosphere. Buffet breakfast daily is very generous. Luna Wayne TripAdvisor The restaurants available were all very good. Friendly staff, helpful disposition made our overall experience wonderful. We will be going again next year. Joseph Hart TripAdvisor The rooms are all renovated and modern. And the staff are very willing to help you plan your day. Thanks for all the staff and this pleased trip! Erin Pierce TripAdvisor Local Tours & Activities

Discover The City

You are in a city where people are never bored. Immerse yourself in local art exhibitions, neighbourhood events, seasonal activities and numerous parks.

Recommended Arts & Culture
Exhibitions & Museum

Don’t miss the excellent art exhibitions coming up. You will always find something you like: traditional paintings, transformative sculptures, interactive art exhibits, and etc.

Discover More Nature
Nearby Parks

Numerous beautiful parks allow you to roam freely in nature even in the city. Each park has its own characteristics, come and check out what surprises it can bring you.

Discover More Dining Experiences
Local Food Tour

How can we not mention all kinds of seasonal delicacies and major food festivals? Highlights: Tarot readings and cocktails nights at CozyStay’s bar every Thursday this month.

Discover More

item.title: About the hotel
item.dc:creator: kaylolo
item.content:encoded:
About The Hotel

Welcome to CozyStay, a luxury apartment hotel in Times Square

Stay in the heart of New York

Luxury furnished serviced apartments in Times Square

Located in Times Square, CozyStay apartment hotel provide a peaceful, private retreat in the heart of one of the worlds most iconic cities. Experience a sophisticated blend of professional services and home comforts. We proudly offers a full range of complimentary amenities and services that provide you with everything you need for an inspiring stay.

The Story Of Our Hotel

The Legend Began in 1998

Our history is rich with influence and class. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit. Aenean commodo ligula eget dolor. Aenean massa. Cum sociis natoque penatibus et magnis dis parturient montes, nascetur ridiculus mus. Donec quam felis, ultricies nec, pellentesque eu, pretium quis, sem. Nulla consequat massa quis enim.

Donec pede justo, fringilla vel, aliquet nec, vulputate eget, arcu. In enim justo, rhoncus ut, imperdiet a, venenatis vitae, justo.

And The Legend Continues...
Enjoy Your Stay At The Hotel

Spend your comfortable holiday in the heart of the beautiful modern city

0 Premium Rooms 0 Studio Rooms 0 Deluxe Suites 0 Luxury Penthouse Extraordinary Accommodations

Choose Your Apartment Type

Luxury Penthouses
Art Apartments
Modern Studios

item.title: Refund and Returns Policy
item.dc:creator: kaylolo
item.content:encoded:
This is a sample page.

Overview

Our refund and returns policy lasts 30 days. If 30 days have passed since your purchase, we cant offer you a full refund or exchange.

To be eligible for a return, your item must be unused and in the same condition that you received it. It must also be in the original packaging.

Several types of goods are exempt from being returned. Perishable goods such as food, flowers, newspapers or magazines cannot be returned. We also do not accept products that are intimate or sanitary goods, hazardous materials, or flammable liquids or gases.

Additional non-returnable items:

  • Gift cards
  • Downloadable software products
  • Some health and personal care items

To complete your return, we require a receipt or proof of purchase.

Please do not send your purchase back to the manufacturer.

There are certain situations where only partial refunds are granted:

  • Book with obvious signs of use
  • CD, DVD, VHS tape, software, video game, cassette tape, or vinyl record that has been opened.
  • Any item not in its original condition, is damaged or missing parts for reasons not due to our error.
  • Any item that is returned more than 30 days after delivery

Refunds

Once your return is received and inspected, we will send you an email to notify you that we have received your returned item. We will also notify you of the approval or rejection of your refund.

If you are approved, then your refund will be processed, and a credit will automatically be applied to your credit card or original method of payment, within a certain amount of days.

Late or missing refunds

If you havent received a refund yet, first check your bank account again.

Then contact your credit card company, it may take some time before your refund is officially posted.

Next contact your bank. There is often some processing time before a refund is posted.

If youve done all of this and you still have not received your refund yet, please contact us at {email address}.

Sale items

Only regular priced items may be refunded. Sale items cannot be refunded.

Exchanges

We only replace items if they are defective or damaged. If you need to exchange it for the same item, send us an email at {email address} and send your item to: {physical address}.

Gifts

If the item was marked as a gift when purchased and shipped directly to you, youll receive a gift credit for the value of your return. Once the returned item is received, a gift certificate will be mailed to you.

If the item wasnt marked as a gift when purchased, or the gift giver had the order shipped to themselves to give to you later, we will send a refund to the gift giver and they will find out about your return.

Shipping returns

To return your product, you should mail your product to: {physical address}.

You will be responsible for paying for your own shipping costs for returning your item. Shipping costs are non-refundable. If you receive a refund, the cost of return shipping will be deducted from your refund.

Depending on where you live, the time it may take for your exchanged product to reach you may vary.

If you are returning more expensive items, you may consider using a trackable shipping service or purchasing shipping insurance. We dont guarantee that we will receive your returned item.

Need help?

Contact us at {email} for questions related to refunds and returns.

item.title: Amenities & Services
item.dc:creator: kaylolo
item.content:encoded:
Amenities & Services

We strive to provide our guests with luxury, comfort & tailor-made service.

Bon Apptit During Vacations and Trips

Experience exquisite cuisine from all over the world

The experienced chefs creates international specialties with unique flavors. Relax with gourmet cuisine and signature cocktails or homemade tonics, all enhanced by beautiful music and gorgeous views over the city.

Opening Hours
  • Monday to Friday: 7:00 am 10:00 pm
  • Saturday and Sunday: 8:00 am 9:00 pm
View Details Enjoy the VIP salon experience

Pamper Yourself With a Divine Salon Experience

Enjoy all our services in a private room for a true VIP salon experience. Whether you need a quick trim and shave before a business meeting, makeup and hair on your wedding day, we offer the highest quality salon experience.

Opening Hours
  • Monday to Friday: 8:30 am 6:30 pm
  • Saturday: 9:30 am 4:30 pm
  • Sunday: Closed
Price List Call Us Introducing Our Services & Facilities

All you need to know to ensure your trip is perfect.

State-of-the-art amenities include a dramatic double-story loft lounge, spectacular rooftop lounge, Technogym fitness center, media corner, and a gracious 24/7 resident services team.

Wellness & Training Spaces

Swimming Pool, Yoga Studio & Fitness Center

Our fitness centre includes a fully equipped gym, yoga room and dance studio. Maintain your fitness routine during the trip over the stunning views of the city.

Opening Hours
  • Swimming Pool: All Day
  • Fitness Center: 7:00 am - 9:00 pm
  • Yoga Studio: 10:00 am - 9:00 pm
View Details For Your Works and Meetings

Comfortable spaces for host your meetings

With over 22,000 square feet of flexible event space, our Special Events Team is here to help you create a truly distinctive event. Please inquire with our sales team for detailed information.

Opening Hours
  • Monday to Friday: 8:30 am 6:30 pm
  • Saturday and Sunday: 9:30 am 4:30 pm
Inquire Now

item.title: Dining
item.dc:creator: kaylolo
item.content:encoded:
Dining Experience

Enjoy a various amount of dining options from around the world.

Bon Apptit During Vacations and Trips

Experience exquisite cuisine at The Restaurant

The experienced chefs creates international specialties with unique flavors. Relax with gourmet cuisine and signature cocktails or homemade tonics, all enhanced by beautiful music and gorgeous views over the city. From seasonal menus to dining experiences to satisfy any craving, see what our chefs are preparing for you.

  • Location: Lobby Level
  • Serves: Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch, Dinner, Dessert
  • Phone: +41 22 345 67 88
  • Hours: 7:00 am - 10:00 pm
View Details

In-Room Dining

Refuel on your own schedule with seasonal, locally fresh items delivered to your door.

  • Serves: Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch, Dinner, Dessert
  • Phone: +41 22 345 67 88
  • Hours: 7:00 am - 10:00 pm
  • Browse the PDF Menus
Order Now Bon Apptit During Vacations and Trips

The Rooftop Restaurant & Bar

Enjoy the New York skyline and the most expansive views from CozyStay Hotel’s Rooftop Bar. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit. Aenean commodo ligula eget dolor. Aenean massa. Cum sociis natoque penatibus et magnis dis parturient montes, nascetur ridiculus mus.

The rooftop is currently open daily for limited bar service from 11am – midnight, weather permitting.

  • Location: Rooftop
  • Serves: Brunch, Lunch, Dinner, Wines
  • Phone: +41 22 345 67 88
  • Hours: 11:00 am - Midnight
View Details

item.title: The Restaurant
item.dc:creator: kaylolo
item.content:encoded:
The Restaurant

Carefully curated menus incorporate locally sourced ingredients into exquisite dishes that reflect the locals and the world around them.

Bon Apptit During Vacations and Trips

Experience exquisite cuisine from all over the world

The experienced chefs creates international specialties with unique flavors. Relax with gourmet cuisine and signature cocktails or homemade tonics, all enhanced by beautiful music and gorgeous views over the city. From seasonal menus to dining experiences to satisfy any craving, see what our chefs are preparing for you.

  • Location: Lobby Level
  • Serves: Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch, Dinner, Dessert
  • Phone: +41 22 345 67 88
  • Hours: 7:00 am -10:00 pm
Book A Table Browse Menus
Weekend Brunch

Join us at the on-site restaurant for your weekend brunch, available Saturday and Sunday from 10am until 3pm. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit. Aenean commodo ligula eget dolor. Aenean massa.

item.title: Wellness
item.dc:creator: kaylolo
item.content:encoded:
Wellness

Relax and restart. Enjoy high-quality professional massage at our health center, obtain a comprehensive stretching of physical and mental.

3,000-SQM Oasis for Wellness & Fitness

Wellness At CozyStay

Get away from the hustle and bustle of everyday life and find total relaxation at our resort. Access to a wellness center of over 3,000 square meters including spa, sauna, swimming pool, gym, yoga and pilates classes and more. You’ll find everything you need, from a dedicated fitness studio to an extensive range of fitness equipment. All carefully planned to help you achieve a balance of energy, body and mind.

Facial & Skincare

Welcome to Wellness

item.title: Local Activities
item.dc:creator: kaylolo
item.content:encoded:
Discover The City

You are in a city where people are never bored. Immerse yourself in local art exhibitions, neighbourhood events, seasonal activities and numerous parks.

Recommended Art & Culture
Exhibitions & Museum

Don’t miss the excellent art exhibitions coming up. You will always find something you like: traditional paintings, transformative sculptures, interactive art exhibits, and etc.

Discover More Recommended Nature
Famous Parks

Numerous beautiful parks allow you to roam freely in nature even in the city. Each park has its own characteristics, come and check out what surprises it can bring you.

Discover More Best choice Dining Experiences
Local Food Tour

How can we not mention all kinds of seasonal delicacies and major food festivals? Highlights: Tarot readings and cocktails nights at CozyStay’s bar every Thursday this month.

Discover More

item.title: Rooms
item.dc:creator: kaylolo
item.content:encoded:
Book Your Stay

A stay infused with creativity and culture.

Welcome to CozyStay Aparthotel
Explore our refined accommodation options and find the perfect space for your stay.

All rooms have a bathroom with bathtub and/or shower, cable television/radio, free WIFI and mini bar. In addition, all rooms are equipped with a Nespresso coffee machine. Most rooms are carpeted, some have parquet flooring.

Luxury Penthouses Art Apartments Modern Studios

item.title: Activity Detail
item.dc:creator: kaylolo
item.content:encoded:
Arts & Culture

Dont miss the excellent art exhibitions coming up. You will always find something you like: traditional paintings, transformative sculptures, interactive art exhibits, and etc.

  • 1000 5th Ave, New York, NY 10028

The Metropolitan Museum of Art

At New York City’s most visited museum and attraction, you will experience over 5,000 years of art from around the world.

  • Sunday to Tuesday: 10:00 am 5:00 pm
  • Friday to Saturday: 10:00 am 9:00 pm
  • Wednesday: Closed
Discover More
  • 1000 5th Ave, New York, NY 10028

Metropolitan Opera

The Metropolitan Opera is a vibrant home for the world’s most creative and talented artists working in opera. Nullam dictum felis eu pede mollis pretium. Integer tincidunt. Aenean leo ligula, porttitor eu.
  • Monday to Saturday: 10:00 am 8:00 pm
  • Sunday: 12:00 pm - 6:00 pm
Discover More
  • 11 W 53rd St, New York, NY 10019

Museum of Modern Art

Located in the heart of Manhattan, The Museum of Modern Art (MoMA) is home to the world’s greatest collection of modern and contemporary art. Nullam dictum felis eu pede mollis pretium. Integer tincidunt. Aenean leo ligula, porttitor eu.

  • 10:30 am 5:30 pm Daily
  • Until 7:00 pm on Saturdays
Discover More
